backend/main.mo: Defines Veda/mantra types, stores mantra translations in a map, and exposes queries for mantra numbers, text, and meaning by language.
backend/migration.mo: Transforms old mantra-meaning data into the new structured translation format and returns an updated actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence linking frontend files to specific feature IDs, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains short descriptions of key frontend files including hooks, main app UI, global styles, and Tailwind config.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the root React element and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main UI with Veda/Mantra/Language selectors, deep-link handling, and display of mantra text and meaning.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches the backend actor based on identity and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, login handling, stored identity loading, and provider setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch mantra numbers, text, and meaning from the backend via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive light/dark theme CSS variables for colors, radius, and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider, importing global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors mapped to CSS variables, typography, container settings, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, and architectural notes for the mantra-browsing app.
